salad_caesar.name: Caesar Salad with Chicken
salad_caesar.short: Romaine lettuce with chicken, parmesan and croutons.
salad_caesar.description: Fresh Caesar salad with tender chicken breast, romaine lettuce, parmesan and crispy croutons. Finished with creamy Caesar dressing.

salad_greek.name: Greek Salad
salad_greek.short: Tomatoes, cucumbers, peppers, olives and feta.
salad_greek.description: A refreshing Greek salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, peppers, olives and creamy feta, refined with high-quality olive oil.

salad_tuna.name: Tuna Salad
salad_tuna.short: Mixed salad with tuna and corn.
salad_tuna.description: A hearty mixed salad with tuna, corn and fresh vegetables, finished with a light dressing.

salad_fresh.name: Fresh Garden Salad
salad_fresh.description: A crisp garden salad made with seasonal vegetables, served with a mild vinegar-oil dressing. Light and refreshing.

salad_coleslaw.name: Coleslaw
salad_coleslaw.short: Cabbage salad with carrots and mayonnaise.
salad_coleslaw.description: Classic American coleslaw with finely shredded cabbage, carrots and creamy mayonnaise. Fresh and mild.

salad_mozzarella.name: Mozzarella with Tomatoes
salad_mozzarella.description: A Caprese-style salad with mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, fresh basil and olive oil. Simple, fresh and full of aroma.
